items.title: “Que una temporada lleguen menos no significa nada, ahora mismo están subiendo las entradas, las rutas cambiarán, pero acabarán llegando, porque Europa es su lugar soñado”
“We should not think the job is done. We still have work to do,”

“We know we are facing a very good team, a finalist in the last edition. They’ve also performed very well,” “If we want to make a change, we have to get a good result. I hope the players, because we have no other solution, will give their best. It’s going to be hard, difficult, but in football everything is possible”
"We wanted a fourth goal to maybe force a drawing of lots, and we wanted to score as many goals as possible to try to win the group,"
"Está asociado con mirar tanto hacia adelante como hacia atrás"

"Weder bei der epochalen Hinwendung Konstantins zum Christentum noch bei der Bewältigung der kirchenpolitischen und dogmatischen Auseinandersetzungen spielte Silvester eine für seine Zeitgenossen erinnerungswürdige Rolle"

“Anybody would be forgiven – based on what we hear and read in the news – for thinking that most of the countries that receive refugees are in Europe, or in North America,”
